function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid changes in the food truck business model in response to COVID-19","Impact":"Decreased consumer confidence and increased risk of contagion if not managed effectively","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation and hygiene protocols, enforce social distancing measures, and provide contactless payment options","Technologies":"Mobile ordering apps, contactless payment systems, and IoT sensors for monitoring hygiene","People":"Consumers, food truck employees, and local community","Owner":"Food truck operators and local health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited research on food trucks and mobile vendors in the context of pandemic response","Impact":"Lack of best practices and guidelines for navigating pandemic challenges within the food truck industry","Mitigation":"Conduct targeted research studies, collaborate with health authorities, and share best practices within the industry","Technologies":"Data analytics for trend analysis, collaboration platforms for knowledge sharing, and communication tools for industry stakeholders","People":"Researchers, industry associations, and regulatory bodies","Owner":"Academic institutions, industry associations, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Increased popularity of food trucks leading to higher consumer exposure to different cuisines","Impact":"Potential increase in foodborne illness and other contagious diseases if proper food safety measures are not followed","Mitigation":"Ensure strict adherence to food safety regulations, conduct regular inspections, and provide food safety training to food truck operators","Technologies":"Food safety management software, IoT sensors for temperature monitoring, and mobile training apps","People":"Consumers, food truck operators, and public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities and industry associations"}]}
